name: telegram-video-forwarder-bot
description: Production-ready Telegram bot that forwards videos from a private channel with user watch history tracking

SOURCE_CHANNEL_ID.description: Numeric ID of your private source channel (e.g., -100xxxxxxxxxx)

FORCE_JOIN_CHANNEL_USERNAME.description: Username of the public channel users must join (without @, e.g., mychannel)

MONGO_URL.description: MongoDB connection URL for persistent storage (optional, uses in-memory if not provided)

WEBHOOK_DOMAIN.description: Your Heroku app name for webhook (e.g., my-bot-app)
